rename.from: Strange validation behavior for fields array
rename.to: issue with clear array errors in FieldArray

body:
Another case which relates to this issue
https://spectrum.chat/react-hook-form/help/error-jumps-to-the-first-field-of-an-array~394e44a8-7cdd-4b3b-adf3-748ce444eca3

issue.title: Using an array of fields with yup for validation

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: ðŸ“‹ React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
When using yup for validating a form that has an array of nested shapes, the errors object for the array of fields doesn't have any way to identify which item in the array is invalid. 

It is possible that I am just using the errors object wrong here, in which case, it would be great to know the right way to do this.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-array-fields-yq0dm
2. Click on 'Add Friend' twice
3. Enter first name and last name only for the first friend
4. Click 'Submit Query'
5. Error message is shown for the first friend where the data is valid. Console has logged errors which only has friends as a list with no way to know which friend has a problem.

**Codesandbox link**
https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-array-fields-yq0dm

**Expected behavior**
There should be a way to know which field in the array has validation issues.

body: @bluebill1049 I found only 4.9.9-beta.1 on codesandbox. I could test on my own project
hey @DisaPadla you can install this beta on the CSB (ignore the drop down, just click install) :) make sure point to 'react-hook-form' instead of './src' folder.

@bluebill1049  look at this example
https://codesandbox.io/s/formstate-is-not-still-valid-after-removing-items-ycu19

1. Append two items
2. make "onBlur" for both new items
3. Remove second and third items

**Result**
`formState.isValid` is still false. `errors` object contains `test: [undefined]`
Awesome thanks a lot, I will patch that issue tonight. â¤ï¸
patched: https://codesandbox.io/s/formstate-is-not-still-valid-after-removing-items-ewufu making PR for the fix now :)

body: `formState.isValid` is still false. Is it okay?

u sure? works for me: 
![Screen Shot 2020-02-27 at 8 19 46 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10513364/75429850-89cf7200-599e-11ea-9f6a-77683d5b3446.png)

https://codesandbox.io/s/formstate-is-not-still-valid-after-removing-items-ewufu

try again, maybe i forgot to save.

Oh, look at this case:
1. Append a second item
2. Append a third item
3. Make onBlur for the second item
4. Make onBlur for the third item
5. Click on Delete for the SECOND item
6. Click on Delete for the third item
`IsValid` is false

But if you replace 5 and 6 steps, like
5. Click on Delete for the THIRD item
6. Click on Delete for the second item
all looks good
